platformSales.name: Mobile, IP related income, etc.
platformSales.footnote: Includes income from smart-device content and royalty income.

platformSales.name: Dedicated video game platform
platformSales.footnote: Includes Nintendo Switch platform, Nintendo 3DS platform and other dedicated video game platforms. Each platform includes hardware, software (including downloadable versions of packaged software, download-only software and add-on content) and accessories

platformSales.name: Digital Sales in dedicated video game platform
platformSales.footnote: Includes downloadable versions of packaged software, download-only software and add-on content.

platformSales.name: Other dedicated video game platforms
platformSales.footnote: Includes amiibo, Virtual Console and platforms other than Nintendo 3DS or Nintendo Switch.
